alert.note: Alert for Colfax; Dodge; Saunders (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 10:02AM CDT until September 23 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Colfax County in northeastern Nebraska... Southwestern Dodge County in east central Nebraska... Northwestern Saunders County in east central Nebraska... * Until 1045 AM CDT. * At 1001 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Schuyler, or 20 miles northeast of David City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... North Bend, Morse Bluff, Rogers, Camp Cedars, and Ames. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
